name: Rebound Gun
description:
Game Features


  • Shooting and Rebounding

In this game, players can use blocking to rebound enemy bullets. Perfect rebounds will temporarily disable enemy attacks.

  • Jumping

Use different routes to reach the destination.

  • Cute and Healing Pixel Art Style

The use of pixel art style for the paper character is not just to save art resources!

Game Objective


  • Defeat the final boss to open the exit of the maze.
